DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study quantify compare prevalence adverse event ( AEs ) patient stage III melanoma initiation interferon ( IFN ) therapy real-world setting . A secondary objective quantify annual cost resource utilization IFN initiation among patient stage III melanoma real-world setting .
